title: The Right Man
description: A pretty woman and a handsome rock star.A modern retelling of Cinderella by New York Times bestselling author Michelle Mankin.A once upon a time with a hooker who used to be a good girl and a bad boy lead singer living a lie.Two lost and lonely souls and a chance encounter on a dark street corner in LA.Is it happenstance, fate or a fairy tale?Can a hookup for cash become a happily ever after? Text ROCK BOOK TO 345345This is for Author Michelle Mankin cover reveal and release text alerts only.
author: Michelle Mankin
